name: Mission 91
description:
Mission 91

I tried to make merge Resident Evil Village atmosphere style to metal gear shooter style to get something unique so ENJOY THE GAME :)

Mission 91 is a simple open world FPS game that you have to kill all the 20 targets available in the desert.

You will be a special squad secret agent and your mission is to get inside the enemies territory in the desert and kill all the 20 targets.

The game is so simple and it took me around 5 days to finish only so there will be somethings that you will be facing like the mean menu as there will be no in the game! 

If you want to get out of the game you have to press Windows key and Tap to get out of it.

Hope you like it and support me to make more games in the future and bigger ones and I promise you that I will be making something very unique! 

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!

NOTE: to exit from the game just press Esc.
